about.title: About Us
about.description: Startale Labs is creating the missing piece for the web3's mass adoption

dapps.title: dApps and Infrastructure Development
dapps.description: We create the core infrastructure and applications for Web3. Please check the product section for specific products.

rd.title: Research & Development
rd.description: We conduct research and development, as well as implementation of the latest technologies, including but not limited to Web3 related technologies and token economics.

incubation.title: Incubation
incubation.description: We provide incubation programs to nurture Web3 startups that accelerate innovation. We also aim to create an ecosystem and strengthen the synergies with Startale Labs.

products.title: Technologies for an open, decentralised, & trust free society
products.astar: The future of smart contracts platform for multichain
products.swanky: All-in-one tool for WASM smart contract developers

products.astar: Astar Network supports the building of dApps with EVM and WASM smart contracts and offers developers true interoperability with cross-consensus messaging (XCM). Astarâ€™s unique Build2Earn model empowers developers to get paid through a dApp staking mechanism for their code and the dApps they build.
products.swanky: Swanky Suite aims to be a "all-in-one" tool for WebAssembly smart contract developers that allows to make next generation dApps.

introduction.title:
Advanced Architecture, 
Development Tools & 
Support
introduction.description: The global team of exceptional developers, cryptography experts, researchers, and solution architects affiliated with Startale Labs provides optimal solutions and support to get projects off the ground. Leveraging a broad range of experience in infrastructure and application support, we offer a wide array of services.

collaborate.title: Collaborative Research
collaborate.description: We work with companies to implement and develop core web3 functionalities.

advise.title: Advisory Services
advise.description: We support optimal corporate decision-making with our cutting-edge knowledge.

dev.title: Core web3 developments
dev.description: We provide comprehensive support from layer 1 blockchain development to application creation.

solutions.web3: Startale Labs builds decentralized applications and infrastructure using next-generation blockchain technology. Built on infrastructure designed with security, scalability, governance, and interoperability in mind, Startale Labs solutions allow your project to grow strategically and adapt to the rapid pace of technology evolution, and ever-changing market demands. Regardless of integration with Astar Network, our experienced team designs and delivers custom solutions based on the requirements.

about.startale: Startale Labs is a web3 tech company developing multi-chain applications and infrastructure in collaboration with Astar Foundation, Web3 Foundation, other projects and large companies. The company will also conduct R&D and incubation based on the experience and connections it has developed with the Astar Network.

sota.name: Sota Watanabe
sota.description: Sota Watanabe is the founder of Astar Network, Next Web Capital and CEO at Startale Labs. He is selected Forbes30 Under 30 both in Japan and Asia in 2022. Apart from that, Sota is one of the directors of Japan Blockchain Association.

shun.name: Shun Ishikawa
shun.description: Shun Ishikawa is COO at Startale Labs and Astar Foundation. Prior to that, he was a producer of an NFT game My Crypto Heroes, which recorded the world's highest DAU/sales/trading volume among Ethereum dApps in 2019.
